meaningMnemonic: When you take the <kanji>whole</kanji> and <kanji>join</kanji> it together, you get a <vocabulary>synthesis</vocabulary>, and probably a good <vocabulary>overall</vocabulary> picture of things.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
